petNameAdd:
1) State of Assam
    Advocate - Sri DK Deka

acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused person namely Robi Teron is absent. E.O ASI Bhadreswar Chutia is present. He is examined and discharged. Having very carefully gone through the evidence of E.O. I find that the P and A issued against accused person namey Robi Teron is executed properly.  Hence accused Robi Teron is declared absconder and  accordingly the case is filed till his arrest
